Vehicle Maintenance Check List

Division:{{doc.company}} Driver:{{doc.driver_name}}
Vehicle Name {{doc.vehicle_name or ''}}
Reg. No {{doc.register_no or ''}}
Model {{doc.model or ''}}
Expiry Date {{frappe.utils.format_date (doc.expiry_date or '')}}
Last Service Date {{frappe.utils.format_date (doc.last_service_date) or '-'}}
Kilometer {{doc.last_kilometer or '-'}}
Present Kilometer {{doc.present_kilometer or ''}}
Complaint {{doc.complaint or ''}}
Garrage Name {{doc.garage_name or ''}}
Supplier {{doc.supplier or ''}}
Approximate Expense {{doc.approximate_exp or ''}}
Time to Finish Work {{doc.time_to_finish_work or ''}}   Days
Actual Expense {{doc.actual_expense or ''}}
Work Finished Date {{frappe.utils.format_date (doc.work_finished_date or '')}}
Vehicle Hand Over Date {{frappe.utils.format_date (doc.vehicle_handover_date or '')}}

Equipment Coordinator Signature
